page.title: 09Trade
page.content:
{BOLSOVER TOWN CENTRE FUNCTION ANALYSIS
We made a survey of the buildings in the centre of Bolsover. The Central Business District covers an area of approximately 0.025 sq.km. We made a note of the name and use of the different buildings at ground floor level and chose 14 categories to classify them. The total number of buildings surveyed was 80.
1. {Offices 13 }2.{Food Shops 12 3.{ Pubs/Cafes 9 }4.{Hairdressers 4 5.{ Garages 1 }6.{Private Houses 9 7.{ Market 1 }8.{Empty Buildings 3 9.{ Chemist/Doctor/Dentist/Optician 5 10.{Clothes/Shoes/Jewellery 9 11.{Decorator/Builder/Hardware 3 12.{Electrical/Furniture/Video 5 13.{Stationery/Newsagent 3 14.{Public Buildings (halls,library) 3
